titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that certain periodical publications shall not be bound publications for mail classification purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Prohibits a weekly periodical publication which is eligible to publish legal notices under the laws of any State, the pages of which were customarily secured by two staples before March 19, 1989, from being considered to be a bound publication for mail classification purposes solely because its pages continue to be secured by two staples after that date.
